about_the_game:
PLAY PINBALL USING CARS


Welcome to Car Mechanic Flipper - where as a car mechanic you buy old and broken cars, repair and pimp them up to finally sell them on auction to get a nice premium for your hard work. The more money you earn on flipping the cars the more you can invest back in your workshop to improve it. Get access to premium cars as a reward for having best in class workshop. All of that nicely packed as an old school arcade pinball game with voxel look and feel.



Apart from the best in class pinball experience there is a whole city in the top part of the gametable where you can go to test your car. Collect fuel and when you have you tank filled enjoy drifting around the trees, visit the stores to buy tools or just go and visit the ZOO. High paced fun awaits. Just don't get caught by the police.







When you master the gameplay it is time to improve your table. There are plenty of options to customize your table for best in class experience. Start with choosing just the right pinball bats. And then focus on levelling up the workshops so you can accept premium cars for repairs.



FEATURES:
  • Fast paced arcade gameplay.
  • Easy to grasp the basics - but challenging to master to perfection
  • Supports both Pad and Keyboard controls.
  • Tons of cars to flip.
  • Hit the mechanics to fix the car.
  • Visit chasis, wheels, body, engine workshops and upgrade relevant car elements.
  • Fuel up and drift around.

Lots of additional content awaiting you in the city. Just start with visiting the voxel ZOO.
